page.title: 07Local Games (cont)
page.content:
out.This goes on until all of the batting team is out.Then the team was fielding are batting and the team which was batting are now fielding and the game goes continues.The team which score the greatest number of runs in an innings are the winners.
Hopscotch
A game for two or more players.It is played outside on flat ground and is played mainly by girls.They place the squares as follows.At the start they have one square on its own with number one in it.Above that they have two squares joined together with numbers two and three in them.Above that there is another one on its own with the number four in it.Then they have two squares above that in them they have the numbers five and six.
